about:
Nocturne

Looking for Members  

Nocturne LFM

We are currently looking for members again, we want to have an active and better roster than we currently do and are willing to trial majority of the players applying. As most of you are aware school is starting soon for almost every (some have already started) and people will stop being as active as they can be, with that please tell us if you're not going to be active due to school / irl things.

Requirements

✧ Some experience when it comes to competitive Overcast or Avicus. ✧ Following orders, if you're not able to follow orders than you're in the wrong place. ✧ You MUST be as active as you can be. ✧ You MUST be able to check skype regularly. ✧ You MUST know how to speak and understand english.

Application

♕ Timezone: ♕ Skype: ♕ Preferred Position: ♕ Are you able to speak and have access to Skype/Teamspeak?: ♕ Past tournaments & Teams (Overcast & Avicus): ♕ Backup Position:

Current Roster: https://avicus.net/teams/1136#membersTab
